text: A reliable and widely available crossbow, suitable for a variety of strategic scenarios. Widely favored by commanders for its simplicity and effectiveness on the battlefield.
An exceptional crossbow that surpasses standard models in craftsmanship and performance.
This crossbow, though mass produced, proves its worth in battles, offering a balanced mix of accuracy and power.
A decent sword paired with a random piece of wood, could anything go wrong?
Raise your shield and live to fight another day!
Your granduncle took an arrow in the knee. Wouldn't have happened if he had this shield.
A combination of offense and defense, merged to best suit the wielder's needs.
A perfect weapon to use against cavalry.
Yue Jin's unwavering commitment on the battlefield, each arrow a testament to his precision and steadfast loyalty to the cause.
This weapon has killed many generals making many Warlord weaker.
A spear said to give it's wielder unshakeable resolve how else can you not want to murder your traitorous brother?
Not even the grave can slow the wielder of this exquisite weapon.
A formidable two-handed axe, the Tiger Cleaver prowls through the chaos of battle with savage prowess.

This masterfully crafted weapon has been designed purely for combat, adopting a humble design and transforming it into a truly deadly tool of war. As it has three prongs, it very clearly has triple the effectiveness and lethality compared to other polearms - that's just basic academics.
The fate of the steppes is decided with the flight of a single arrow.
This axe has been stained with the lifeblood of an uncountable number of victims.
An unshatterable weapon, for a warrior with impreachable faith.
A pair of ancient jian said to be forged by by legendary swordsmith, Ou Yezi. Zhanlu is apparently imbued with the essence of fire, whilst Yuchang is said to be able to slice through iron.
The potency of weather's wrath powers each arrow shot.
